channel.title: Politics on Inkchron
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Inkchron

item.title: UK General Election 2025: Labour Party Secures Historic Majority
item.description: The Labour Party has secured a historic victory in the 2025 UK general election, winning a commanding parliamentary majority that marks the end of 15 years of Conservative government and ushers in a new era of British politics.

item.title: US and China Announce Major Climate Cooperation Agreement at COP30
item.description: In a landmark announcement at the COP30 climate summit in Brazil, the United States and China have unveiled a comprehensive climate cooperation agreement that represents the most significant bilateral climate commitment between the world’s two largest economies.

item.title: EU Artificial Intelligence Act Implementation: A New Era for AI Regulation
item.description: The European Union’s Artificial Intelligence Act, one of the world’s first comprehensive AI regulations, officially came into full effect today, marking a significant milestone in the governance of artificial intelligence technologies across the 27-member bloc.
